name: Fruitless Raids
description:
Story

The events take place in an Earth-like planet called Deneb Kaitos-d, 96 light years away from Earth.

A froot Megacorp named "Apricorps" makes an attempt to buy the good land that Augustus X. uses to grow fresh froots and share with the good people for free. Their mega offer met with rejection as Augustus doesn't want to sell his land and change his life style. In response to this act, they send the ex-general and now-mercenary to convince him, Anteeno, who delivers the message in a typical way. A war is waged and an army of bugs and animal mercenaries is sent to the land to sabotage and steal, and put Augustus' life to misery.

Froots are like fruits on Earth but better and are the main food and the finest gift that the giant star could give.

Source code will be uploaded when I have the chance [Game maker 8]

Note: a small manual is included
